publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for the account.

privateEndpointConnections.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the account.

locations.description: Device Update account primary and failover location details

mqttBrokerEndpoints.description: MQTT Broker endpoints used for device communication.

deviceEnrollmentScope.description: Subscription or resource group used for device enrollment.

deviceEnrollmentManagedIdentityResourceI.description: User assigned managed identity used for device enrollment.

identity.description: The type of identity used for the resource.

keyVaultKeyUri.description: The URI of the key vault

userAssignedIdentity.description: The full resourceId of the user assigned identity to be used for key vault access. Identity has to be also assigned to the Account

Encryption.description: The CMK encryption settings on the Device Update account.

role.description: Whether the location is primary or failover

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Accounts list.

accountName.description: Parent Device Update Account name which Instance belongs to.

iotHubs.description: List of IoT Hubs associated with the account.

enableDiagnostics.description: Enables or Disables the diagnostic logs collection

DiagnosticStorageProperties.description: Customer-initiated diagnostic log collection storage properties

connectionString.description: ConnectionString of the diagnostic storage account

resourceId.description: ResourceId of the diagnostic storage account

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Instances list.

IotHubSettings.description: Device Update account integration with IoT Hub settings.

AccountUpdate.description: Request payload used to update and existing Accounts.

identity.description: The type of identity used for the resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

TagUpdate.description: Request payload used to update an existing resource's tags.

tags.description: List of key value pairs that describe the resource. This will overwrite the existing tags.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: The available private link resources for an Account

value.description: The list of available private link resources for an Account

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of private link resources.

GroupInformation.description: The group information for creating a private endpoint on an Account

properties.description: The properties for a group information object

GroupInformationProperties.description: The properties for a group information object

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of private link group ID.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProxyListResult.description: The available private endpoint connection proxies for an Account (not to be used by anyone, here because of ARM requirements)

value.description: The list of available private endpoint connection proxies for an Account

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of private endpoint connection proxies.

properties.description: Private endpoint connection proxy object property bag.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection proxy resource.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProxyProperties.description: Private endpoint connection proxy object properties.

location.description: ARM location of the remote private endpoint.

immutableSubscriptionId.description: Original subscription ID needed by Microsoft.Network.

immutableResourceId.description: Original resource ID needed by Microsoft.Network.

manualPrivateLinkServiceConnections.description: List of private link service connections that need manual approval.

privateLinkServiceConnections.description: List of automatically approved private link service connections.

privateLinkServiceProxies.description: List of private link service proxies.

location.description: ARM location of the remote private endpoint.

immutableSubscriptionId.description: Original subscription ID needed by Microsoft.Network.

immutableResourceId.description: Original resource ID needed by Microsoft.Network.

remotePrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: Remote private link service connection state

ConnectionDetails.description: Private endpoint connection proxy object properties.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of Agents list.

ProtocolId.description: The protocol identifier representing the version of the device update protocol the agent supports.

protocolId.description: The protocol identifier representing the version of the device update protocol the agent supports

compatibilityProperties.description: The compat properties of the agent. This object can be thought of as a set of key-value pairs where the key is the name of the compatibility property and the value is the value of the compatibility property. There will always be at least 1 compat property and no more than 5

version.description: The version of the agent info used to distinguish whether the agent info needs to be updated from the agent

AgentInfo.description: The agent info for the agent that indicates what updates it is compatible with.

values.name: ApplyDeployment
values.description: Apply the deployment to the agent

DeploymentAction.description: The deployment action the agent take

retryTimestamp.description: Datetime when the call requested the deployment be retried.

update.description: The update that this step installs if it is of reference type.

resultDetails.description: A string containing further details about the install result

StepResult.description: The step result under an update.

resultDetails.description: A string containing further details about the install result

InstallResult.description: The install result of an update and any step results under it.

state.description: The state the agent is in this deployment

DeploymentInfo.description: The agent metadata for a deployment.

agentId.description: This is the external device Id of the Microsoft.Devices/Device resource referenced by this agent

deviceClassId.description: This is the ID of the device class of this agent

deviceResourceId.description: This is the resource Id of the Microsoft.Devices/Device resource referenced by this agent

activeMqttBrokerEndpoint.description: This is the active MQTT broker endpoint for this agent

agentInfo.description: This is the compatibility info for the agent that indicates what version of the device update protocol it supports and its compat properties.

latestDeploymentInfo.description: This is the metadata about the latest deployment the agent has attempted

installedUpdateId.description: The current installed update Id on this agent

GroupIdParameter.name: groupId
GroupIdParameter.description: The group ID of the private link resource.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProxyIdParamete.name: privateEndpointConnectionProxyId
PrivateEndpointConnectionProxyIdParamete.description: The ID of the private endpoint connection proxy object.
